name: powder
caption: Powder

effect.short: Explodes if the target uses a []{type:fire} move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
effect.full: Explodes if the target uses a []{type:fire} move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.

flavorText:
The user covers the target in a combustible powder.
If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder
explodes and damages the target.
